text: Pas, qavmas Nuhro duruƣ sumoridand. Mo u va hamrohonasro dar kisti nacot dodem va ononro conisini pesinijon soxtem va kasonero, ki ojoti Moro duruƣ mesumurdand, ƣarq kardem. Pas, (ej Rasul) ʙingar, ki oqiʙati ʙimdodasudagon (ja'ne kasone, ki turo duruƣ sumoridand va ʙar kufrason davomat kardand) ci guna ʙud
